Name: Peanut (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature into a peanut plant. Has a chance to yield multiple nuts.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature into a peanut plant. Has a chance to yield multiple nuts.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature into a peanut plant. Has a chance to yield multiple nuts.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 8 Tagen zu einer Erdnusspflanze heran. Bringt manchmal mehrere Erdnüsse pro Ernte ein.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Через 8 дней вырастает куст арахиса, который и после первого сбора будет продолжать плодоносить.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天种植。 花生成熟需要8天。有机会产出多个花生。
